column4: okay.. can anybody here give me a link on how to install and configure squirrelmail in ubuntu?
well, sudo apt-get install squirrelmail   should install it.
that can only be true to most of the IRC clients.. but not xchat
well i don't get alerted when soemone says "indy" or "IGF" or "Indygun".. or some other lazy way that people refer to me.
